Actions.Title: Accept these settings, or enter your own.
Actions.Prompt:
Width: Defaults to 400.

PickList Size: Default 15. The number of items in the PickList before the list starts scrolling. The Prompt's height is adjust to accomodate this number.

When you run the Spotlight prompt, if it has two vertical scroll bars, please click the Help button.

title: Example 9: Custom Prompt Width,  Custom PickList Size (height)
placeholder: Select an item
